amendment.description: To require the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to issue guidelines identifying opportunities for achieving and accurately measuring fair participation of small business concerns in micro-purchases.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4191 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4191 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S5514; text: CR S5514) To require the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to issue guidelines identifying opportunities for achieving and accurately measuring fair participation of small business concerns in micro-purchases.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4191 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Snowe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4191 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
